nodes.text: The Jorgan Spa was a luxury establishment that existed during the Galactic Civil War. When Boba Fett delivered a bounty to the Bounty Hunters' Guild on Carajam, a Guild agent offered to deduct 3000 credits off of his payment for a special deal on the spa. Fett declined, however, walking away upon hearing of the offer and proceeded to search for further bounties at the Guild hub.
